subject: p13606683
History: Evaluation of the patient with worsening hypoxia.
Findings: Portable AP radiograph of the chest was reviewed in comparison to, obtained at 9:52 am. Current study demonstrates interval redevelopment of interstitial pulmonary edema seen in perihilar areas and lower lobes. It obscures currently the appearance of the left upper lobe consolidation, but no interval worsening of the left upper lobe consolidation demonstrated. Small amount of pleural effusion cannot be excluded. Pacemaker defibrillator leads are in unchanged position.
